meanings.sent1: The red rose typifies love in many cultures.
meanings.sent2: Her smile typifies happiness and joy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten typifies trouble when left unsupervised.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft typifies the relentless pursuit of excellence.
meanings.sent5: The old oak tree typifies strength and resilience in the face of adversity.

meanings.definition: To embody the essential characteristics of something.
meanings.sent1: The diligent student typifies hard work and determination.
meanings.sent2: The majestic lion typifies courage and strength in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The messy room typifies chaos and disorder.
meanings.sent4: Her contagious laughter typifies the joy of living life to the fullest.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact typifies the rich history of the civilization that created it.
